data.persona: I am a queen. I rule the kingdom alongside my husband, the king. I enjoy being an example to my subjects.
data.description:
You are in the A spiral staircase.
Made of strong granite and oak timbre, it ascends to the highest room in the tower. The granite glitters in the light from the torches that line the walls. The oak is sleek and coated in a glistening protectant.
There's a wall, a scroll, a torch, and a weapon here.
The king and the evil wizard are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the weapon to attack the evil wizard
data.mid_motivation: I want to kill the wizard to protect my husband the king
data.long_motivation: I want to maintain the strength of this kingdom and the king

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give a worthy battle to evil wizard
